text: qal lahum mwsa: 'iina allah yqwl: 'iinaha baqarat ghyr mdhllt lileamal fi hratht al'ard llzraet, waghayr mueadat llsqy min alsaqyt, wkhalyt min aleuyub jmyeha, walays fiha elamt min lawn ghyr lawn jldha. qalu: alan jit bhqyqt wasaf albqrt, fadtru 'iilaa dhbhha baed tul almrawght, waqad qarbu 'alaa yafealuu dhlk lenadhm. whkdha shadaduu fshddad allah elyhm
